abstract: World Series programs, a chronicler of the ages, are more corporate then they used to be, designed by Major League Baseball rather than the teams involved; programs that were once primarily scorecards now have about 300 pages stuffed with articles about their team's favorite players and their opponent's.
snippet: Since 1903, the World Series program has chronicled baseball through the prism of world wars, the Great Depression and the space age.
lead_paragraph: Since 1903, the World Series program has chronicled baseball through the prism of world wars, the Great Depression and the space age.

headline.main: Get Your World Series Programs Here!
headline.print_headline: Get Your World Series Programs Here!
headline.seo: The History of the World Series Baseball Program
